A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you have never seen any of the other Star Wars movies\, The Last Jedi is a fine movie. It is reasonably entertaining and not bad to go see with some friends on a friday night. BUT if you have seen any of the other movies\, The Last Jedi is just bad. It does not follow the themes\, character development or feel of any of the other movies. This movie might as well be a Marvel movie with the cheeky dialogue\, over the top action\, and half hearted attempts at romance.
